adHeader: Kitty and Doggy Pet Care in your home - VISIT MY WEBSITE!
adDetails: add tools to your posting: hilighter on ur page/site Hello, My name is Elke and . . . . I will give all your pets loving care while you're gone!! I offer a full spectrum of pet care services in your home. Please visit my website to find out more about my rates and services offered. I am fully insured - proof of insurance will be provided upon request. References are available, as well. I am able to give pets their oral medications as well as subcutaneous injections and sub-q fluids. Please give me a call and I will be happy to meet with you for a complimentary consultation to discuss your pet and house care needs. Thank you for visiting. Elke Mulgrew Wild Elk and Domesticated Pet Care show contact info
